start.text: Are you sure you have the right person?

choices.text: Yes. I want to ask you some questions.
Is what they say true about you?
Why do you think the mayor hosted this party?
I think I made a mistake. Bye.

mistake.text: I knew it was a mistake...

identity.text: Uh... yeah. I hate the mayor. Really hate that guy.

choices.text: You don't really sound like you do.
Me too. In fact, I think he is evil.

talk_to.text: I don't know... I think The Tiki is pretty cool...

secret_agenda.text: Uhhhh. I don't know... I'm sure he has some reason. I don't think he has a secrete agenda or anything that you should worry about though....

choices.text: Sigh.... Ok. I don't.... I'll tell you a secret. I only act like I hate the mayor so I can gather intel for him.

evil.text: The mayor is many things, but never evil. Maybe you're a fool...

bad_thing.text: I shouldn't have told you anything...
